verses.1: Ka khutte galdo nading ka khutmete galkap nadingin a hilh, keimah a hong hu, Topa in thupha ngah tahen.
verses.2: Amah pen ka suangpi le ka munkip muanhuai, ka kulhpi le hong hon khia pa, ka lum le ka belh pa, ka nuai ah mite a zopa ahi hi.
verses.3: Topa aw, nangmah in na hong phawk tham dingin mi pen bang hi a, nangmah in na hong ngaihsut tham dingin mihingʼ tapa bang ahi hiam?
verses.4: Mi pen husan khat tawh kibang a, ama hunte pen a tai dandan niliim tawh kibang hi.
verses.5: Topa aw, na vanpite niamsak inla, hong pai suk in. Mualte lawng inla, meikhu suaksak in.
verses.6: Khuaphialep phiasak inla, amaute kithehthangsak in. Na thaltangte lawn inla, amaute susia in.
verses.7: A sangna mun panin na khut hong zan inla, tui lian lauhuaite le gamdang miteʼ vangliatna panin hong hon khia in.
verses.8: A kam uh tawh zuau thu a gente le limtakin kiciamna a bawl khit ciang nangawnin zuau thu mah a gen lai veveteʼ kiang pan kei hong phel inla, hong hon khia ta in.
verses.9: Pasian aw, la thak khat kong sak dinga, harp zang sawm khausai lasakna nang kong tum ding hi.
verses.10: Kumpite tungah gualzawhna a pia pa, na nasem David a hon khia pa na hi hi.
verses.11: A gilo galte kiang panin kei hong hon inla, a kam uh tawh zuau thu a gen limtakin kiciamna a bawl khit ciang nangawnin zuau a gen lai veve gamdang miteʼ khut sung pan kei hong hon khia in.
verses.12: Ka tapate uh a tangval lai-in khang cingin a khauh mahmah singkungte bang ta henla, ka tanute uh a nungak lai-in kumpi inn lamna dinga a kisui innkiu khuampite bang tahen.
verses.13: Ka saalte uh a dimin an nam khempeuh om ta henla, ka tuute uh a tultul a thenthen-in gamlak ah suak tahen.
verses.14: Ka kongzingte uh ah cimawhin kikona om kei tahen.
verses.15: Tua bang thupha a ngah mi mi lungdam ahi hi. Topa pen amauʼ Pasian ahi mite pen mi lungdam ahi hi.
